metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a Banite in the Audience Hall.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book - Quest Flags - Act 3 (Wyr) - Kill Director Gortash - Go to Gortash in his office (With Netherstones)Debug Book - Quest Flags - Act 3 (Wyr) - Kill Director Gortash - Go to Audience Hall

0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Aischa
0.text: In this sanctum, you will obey our lord and Archduke.

1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Aischa
1.text: The word of our lord is sacred. You will not defy it.
